home.title: Authenticator
home.subtitle: Example i18n App!
home.description: This is an example React Native application demonstrating how to implement internationalization (i18n) using react-i18next. The app allows users to switch between different languages for a more localized experience.
home.exploringLanguagesDescription: Click on country flags to explore the app's content in different languages.

settings.scanToStart: Scan a QR code to start the 2FA setup.
settings.deleteConfirm: Deleting an account will prevent you from using this device to authenticate

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.permisionText: We need access to your camera to scan QR codes. Please grant camera permissions to continue using the scanning feature.
permissions.settingManually: You need to manually enable camera permissions
